alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 09 at 12:52PM MST until May 10 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southern Apache and Navajo counties including Show Low, St. Johns, Springerville, Eagar, Greer, Pinetop-Lakeside, Alpine, Whiteriver. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains
